author: Danielle Zoellner
title: Coronavirus: Trump says people should say 'thank you very much' for virus response despite death toll hitting 40,000
description: President Donald Trump has said Americans should say "thank you very much" for his coronavirus response on the same day the death toll tips 40,000 people.
content:
President Donald Trump has said Americans should say thank you very much for his coronavirus response on the same day the death toll tips 40,000 people.
